job_description: Tampere University and Tampere University of Applied Sciences create a unique environment for multidisciplinary, inspirational and high-impact research and education. Our universities community has its competitive edges in technology, health and society. www.tuni.fi/enTWO POSTDOCTORAL RESEARCHER POSITIONSWe are recruiting two postdoctoral researchers to a large, multidisciplinary research consortium. Both positions are fixed-term positions for a duration of 28 months, starting May 1st 2022 or as mutually agreed. TRANSFORM (Transforming welfare systems) is a new research platform, bridging the faculties of management and business, social sciences, and medicine and health technologies, and their numerous research groups. The TRANSFORM platform supports researchers and research groups that study welfare systems and services and their effectiveness and equitability, and helps them to collaborate with public, private and third sector organizations, and with other stakeholders. Welfare system/service refers to both health care and/or social care systems/services.  The TRANSFORM platform helps researchers and research projects in acquiring external research grants, setting up and carrying out the projects, and in interacting with different stakeholders.
